legality of online weapons and ammunition sales like the ones that supplied their 
daughter's killer.

base.

opinion on gun laws in a way other recent mass shootings have not. Overall, 70%

not long after a mass shooting in Las Vegas killed 58 people.

items.title: White House: 'Varying confidence' of chemical weapon use in Syria
items.htmlTitle: White House: 'Varying confidence' of chemical weapon use in Syria
items.snippet:
The White House confirms that the Assad regime in Syria may have used "small 
amounts" of chemical weapons in Syria. Now the question is: what will the US do 
next? MSNBC's Lawrence O'Donnell and Mother Jones' David Corn discuss the 
White House's measured and prudent response to this new information.

not long after a mass shooting in Las Vegas killed 58 people.

items.title: Public attitudes on gun policy shift quickly following Parkland | MSNBC
items.htmlTitle: Public attitudes on gun policy shift quickly following Parkland | MSNBC
items.snippet:
6 days ago ... The findings suggest the school shooting in Parkland, Florida, has shifted public 
opinion on gun laws in a way other recent mass shootings have not. Overall, 70% 
now say they back stricter gun laws, up from 52% who said so in an October poll 
not long after a mass shooting in Las Vegas killed 58 people.

items.htmlTitle: White House: 'Varying confidence' of chemical weapon use in Syria
items.snippet:
The White House confirms that the Assad regime in Syria may have used "small 
amounts" of chemical weapons in Syria. Now the question is: what will the US do 
next? MSNBC's Lawrence O'Donnell and Mother Jones' David Corn discuss the 
White House's measured and prudent response to this new information.

opinion on gun laws in a way other recent mass shootings have not. Overall, 70% 
now say they back stricter gun laws, up from 52% who said so in an October poll 
not long after a mass shooting in Las Vegas killed 58 people.

items.title: NRA president says assault weapon ban will not pass
items.htmlTitle: NRA president says assault weapon ban will not pass
items.snippet:
Vice President Joe Biden is wrapping up his gun reform task force and plans to 
deliver the findings to President Obama next week. The NRA says an assault 
weapons ban is not going to become a reality. Mark Glaze of Mayors Against 
Illegal Guns joins Ed Schultz to explain whether the NRA's prediction will come 
true.

true.

convention — an annual meeting of pistols and politics that this year boasted a 
500,000 square foot firearms display. The convention, conceived by the Union 
officers who founded the NRA after the Civil War, is in its 145th year.

items.title: NRA president says assault weapon ban will not pass
items.htmlTitle: NRA president says assault weapon ban will not pass
items.snippet:
Vice President Joe Biden is wrapping up his gun reform task force and plans to 
deliver the findings to President Obama next week. The NRA says an assault 
weapons ban is not going to become a reality. Mark Glaze of Mayors Against 
Illegal Guns joins Ed Schultz to explain whether the NRA's prediction will come 
true.

true.

items.snippet:
Jun 13, 2013 ... Duncan fears IRS firearms. Associated Press. With Rep. Michele Bachmann (R-
Minn.) retiring at the end of this Congress, I don't think there's any doubt who'll

items.title: NRA president says assault weapon ban will not pass
items.htmlTitle: NRA president says assault weapon ban will not pass
items.snippet:
Vice President Joe Biden is wrapping up his gun reform task force and plans to 
deliver the findings to President Obama next week. The NRA says an assault 
weapons ban is not going to become a reality. Mark Glaze of Mayors Against 
Illegal Guns joins Ed Schultz to explain whether the NRA's prediction will come 
true.

items.title: Inside the 2016 NRA convention | MSNBC
items.htmlTitle: Inside the 2016 NRA convention | MSNBC
items.snippet:
May 22, 2016 ... This May, Louisville, Kentucky played host to the National Rifle Association 
convention — an annual meeting of pistols and politics that this year boasted a 
500,000 square foot firearms display. The convention, conceived by the Union 
officers who founded the NRA after the Civil War, is in its 145th year.

officers who founded the NRA after the Civil War, is in its 145th year.
